name: OBERON – Hotel reservation
author: Mário Moravčík, Exalogic, s.r.o.

sections.description:
Reservation form plugin allows you to sell accommodation through your website.

Plugin works for system OBERON owners for apartments, agrotourism, private accommodation, B&B hotels, hostels, boarding houses, guest rooms, inns, holiday resorts, villas, and accommodation bureau management.

As it has direct connection to the system all is on-line immediately and the system behaves accordingly to settings on the OBERON API. Automatically checks accommodation and prices and upon binding reservation it changes availability.

All changes are visible to accommodation reception in time no need for third party systems.

FUNCTIONALITY

Plugins:

  • Reservation form
sections.installation:
Short description:

Extract the zip file and just drop the contents in the wp-content/plugins/ directory of your WordPress installation and then activate the Plugin from Plugins page.

Long description:

  1. Upload `plugin-name.php` to the `/wp-content/plugins/` directory.

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.

  3. Prepare your network for direct internet access via single port.

  4. Set the your external ip and port address on widget Settings page to enable plugin to work.

  5. Go to widgets.

  6. Drag the OBERON Hotel reservation widget to sidebar or page.

  7. Choose preffered type of reservation.

  8. Enjoy!

Do you need help? Contact with us.

exalogic@exalogic.sk
sections.faq:
Which languages are available by default?

Languages available by default are Slovak, Czech, English, German and Polish. If there is a need for other translations or changes in the default languages, all language files can be found in the ‘lang’ directory of the plugin (starting with ‘frm-reservation’ prefix).

Do I need OBERON system to work with plugin?

Yes, you also need to create system user in OBERON to allow acces to OBERON Web API.
For small accommodations it can be used for free with full version.

Do you need help? Contact with us.

exalogic@exalogic.sk
sections.changelog:
1.4.4

Release Date – 6 June 2023

  • Updated and tested for WordPress version up to 6.2.2.
  • Changes to javascript code when handling dates and date fields.

1.4.3

Release Date – 12 April 2022

  • Manual language selection which can be set in shortcode as argument. This enables each page or post to have it’s designated translation.
  • Expandig of translation resources.
  • If OBERON system admin enables advanced descriptions, the plugin takes this data and shows detailed descriptions for availability of accommodation (eg. if the minimal reservation term length requirement was not met, or it is not possible to arrive on selected day and so on).
  • Automatic availability verification on wizard page slide which also handles the availability of reservation send if there are problems.

1.4.2

  • Patch in translation error for request type.
  • Hiding of carousel page indicators in CSS.

1.4.1

  • Patch of error in request for new Binding reservation, which prevented creation of Binding reservation, and created only Enquiry for reservation.

1.4

  • Javascript updates to match API object definitions in system OBERON.

1.3

  • Updated and tested for WordPress version up to 5.7.2
  • Minor update of javascript object initialization

1.2

  • Updated and tested for WordPress version up to 5.5.1
  • Minor CSS style updates

1.1

  • Updated version for OBERON Web API hotel reservation new advanced possibilities.
  • Allow room type change when desired room type is not free. If the change is enabled and client want’s a two person reservation (selects room type 2+0 e.g. Double room) and this is not free the system returns another valid room type which is free e.g. 2+1. If the setting is disabled the system returns that the reservation is not possible, no room of that type is free.
  • Use price calculation by selected guest type. This setting is usable for accommodations which want to have different price calculation in reservation form and want that the system prefers this guest type for calculation.

1.0

  • Initial version of OBERON Web hotel reservation connector plugin.
